title: Divided Supreme Court Curbs Pension Suits
itunes:title: Divided Supreme Court Curbs Pension Suits
description:
Robert Hockett, a professor at Cornell Law School, discusses the Supreme Court ruling that U.S. Bank NA won’t have to face a lawsuit challenging steep losses to its pension plan, because the plan participants who filed suit have nothing to gain or lose through the case. June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
